colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA MCHED DGU'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO'I AAS MAG HO THO KV'AOD WANG TSE MDO SKYABS KYI DPON MO AER TE NI T'A RA TSE DPAG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^RGYAL KHANG RTZE ZHAS 'BOD PA BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG SKYABS DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BKA' DRIN 'GRAN ZLA MED PA DE NYID KYI DNGOS KYI SLOB MA SLOB DPON 'PHIN LAS GRAGS PAS BRIS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
